General_Description: '''Wipe Them Out''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]] in 2018.
Section_Description: Kassandra answered the call of a priestess.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire'', priestess. Anything I can help you with?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''That [[Sparta]]n leader is finally dead. But those ''malákes'' soldiers who follow him... some of them still plague our [[Greece|land]] and [[Aegean Sea|sea]]. I want them all gone.''
<tabber>
|-|You need the ships destroyed.=
TBA
|-|You want all the Spartans to die.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to kill all the Spartans?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Not strong enough. I want all their [[ship]]s destroyed.''
</tabber>
<tabber>
|-|I'll destroy them.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''You'll be doing divine work.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''May the [[Fates]] be on your side.''
|-|Hind another misthios.=
Kassandra left, but reconsidered her decision and returned to speak with the priestess again.
</tabber>
Kassandra left to board the [[Adrestia]] and proceeded to sink five Spartan boats roaming the sea. After that, she returned to the woman to collect her reward.
*'''Priestess:''' ''Back already? Did you destroy them all?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It would be hard to piece them back together.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''I knew the [[Greek mythology|Gods]] intended us to meet. Please, take this.''
She gave her a bag of [[drachma]]e.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra managed to fulfill the priestess' request.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
{{ACODMemories}}
[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
[[Category:Memories relived using the Animus HR-8.5]]
